extends java.lang.Object
    Client of remote Savour server

        public <T> void get(java.lang.String endpoint,
                    java.lang.Class<T> type,
                    androidx.lifecycle.MutableLiveData<AsyncData<T>> liveData)
        Fetches an endpoint using the client and posts response to a MutableLiveData on completion.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the JSON-decoded payload type
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the endpoint to point a base request at
        type - the type of class the JSON payload decodes into
        liveData - the data that will be posted to on completion

      • get

        public <Res> void get(java.lang.String endpoint,
                      java.lang.Class<Res> type,
                      com.android.volley.Response.Listener<Res> responseListener,
                      com.android.volley.Response.ErrorListener errorListener,
                      @Nullable
                      LoadListener loadListener)
        Fetches an endpoint using the client and posts response to a MutableLiveData on completion.
        Type Parameters:
        Res - the JSON-decoded payload type
        Parameters:
        endpoint - the endpoint to point a base request at
        type - the type of class the JSON payload decodes into
        responseListener - callback fired when response is received
        errorListener - callback fired when an error occurs
        loadListener - callback fired when loading begins
